text:
@marklevinshow I'd like to point out the obvious:
1) It says MALARIA on it, not Covid-19. 
2) This script is from 10 Jul 08 - July 10, 2008. 
3) The 19 in Covid-19 means 2019 was when it was discovered.
4) You proudly provided proof to the world that you're not smarter than a box of rocks.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
